meanings.sent1: She felt carless after selling her vehicle.
meanings.sent2: The carless family relied on public transportation.
meanings.sent3: The carless student had to walk to school every day.
meanings.sent4: The carless neighborhood was quiet without the sound of engines.
meanings.sent5: The carless road stretched out before them, inviting a leisurely stroll.

meanings.sent1: He became carless when his old car broke down.
meanings.sent2: The carless couple decided to bike to work instead.
meanings.sent3: The carless friend always asked for rides to get around.
meanings.sent4: The carless situation forced them to explore other modes of transportation.
meanings.sent5: The carless lifestyle brought unexpected freedom and simplicity to their lives.
